oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Jesus Name Tradition serpent bite service home movie, 1974
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Vance, Mary
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Video recording begins with home footage of Larry Elledge recovering from serpent bite. Recording also depicts a service with lay preaching, serpent and fire handling. There is also home footage of Johnny Holbrook recovering from a serpent bite. Then there is a service where a man is bitten by a serpent. Home footage of the man follows. Recording ends with small service where members dance with serpents.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Appalachian Region -- Religious life and customs; Imposition of hands; Lay preaching; Snakebites; Snake cults (Holiness churches) -- Appalachian Region
Elledge, Larry; Holbrook, Johnny
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Jesus Name tradition services home movies
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Mary Vance Jesus Name Tradition photographs and home movies
